name: Mega Turrican
overview: You are Bren McGuire, leader of the United Planets Freedom Forces, about to embark on a crucial mission against the dark forces of The Machine in a planet-wide struggle to save the galaxy. Protected by your Turrican Assault Suit and equipped with an arsenal of state-of-the-art weaponry, battle your way through fifteen danger-filled levels to defeat the soldiers of evil and secure eternal freedom for the universe. Use your courage, strength, cunning and the mighty plasma rope to find the Alien Queen's lair for the ultimate confrontation. • 5 worlds and 15 levels! • 15 boss monsters as big as your screen! • Unique weaponry, including the plasma rope! • Scrolling speed as fast as a sonic boom! • Continuous action that stretches the Sega Genesis' capabilities to its limits! • Adjusts automatically to 6-button controllers!
